senses.sense_definition: Relating to the name used for the inhabitants of a specific place.

examples.text: The <w>gentilic</w> adjective for a person from Canada is Canadian.
Linguists study how <w>gentilic</w> forms vary across different languages.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to a tribe, clan, or nation.

examples.text: The historian analyzed the <w>gentilic</w> structures of ancient Roman society.
Many <w>gentilic</w> traditions have been preserved within the remote community.

senses.sense_definition: A word that identifies a resident or native of a particular place.

examples.text: The word "Londoner" is the <w>gentilic</w> for someone who lives in London.
It is sometimes difficult to guess the correct <w>gentilic</w> for a small village.

senses.sense_definition: A personal name or surname derived from a place name.

examples.text: His last name is a <w>gentilic</w> that traces back to a town in Sicily.
Is the name Corleone a <w>gentilic</w> referring to the city?
